ILGC 
–
 
1: 
JLPL 
Falcon View
 
walkthrough, 28 Oct 2023
 
 
 
 
 
All questions relate to the AREA YOU HAVE WALKED THROUGH
. 
 
Observe and gather information. 
 
Use guesstimates. 
 
Talk to residents, as required. 
 
Follow the Dos and 
Don'ts
!

Housing
 
Arav:

Arav:
 
•
 
Since when is this housing society occupied by 
residents?
 
•
 
How many 
towers are there in this society?
 
•
 
How many 
apartments are there in 
each tower?
 
 
•
 
How many 
2/3/4 BHK
 
apartments
 
are there in this society
?
 
•
 
What is the 
area (approx.) of each of these apartments?
 
•
 
How many 
of these apartments are 
occupied (approx.)?
 
•
 
How many 
residents 
(approx.) 
are there
 
in this society
? 
 
•
 
What is the 
approx.

approx.
 
housing density (number of residents per unit area)
?

•
 
Is 
the 
piped 
water 
supply
 
regular to each of these apartments
?
 
•

•
 
Do the residents use water purifiers
?
 
(
e.g., RO system)
 
•
 
Ha
s society ever experienced 
water scarcity?
 
If yes, what is the alternative water source?

nergy

in

? If so, how long do the

(e.g., TV, fridge, AC, washing machine)?
 
Do they own multiple 
TVs, A
C
s?
 
•
 
Is there a power back
-
up
? If yes, how many 
diesel 
generator sets 
are 
there to provide power 
backup?

•

Are renewable energy sources (
e.g.,
 
solar 
photovoltaic panels
 
for electricity generation, solar

•

•

people 
use
 
LPG
 
cylinders?
 
Is any other fuel (wood
, coal, 
electricity) used for cooking?

•
 
Where 
is
 
the collected 
domestic wastewater 
treated
? 
E.g., 
is it sent to a 
municipal 
wastewater 
treatment plant
 
or is it treated in a 
sewage 
treatment plant within the society
?
 
 
•
 
If
 
the society ha
s
 
its own sewage treatment plant (STP)
, 
what is 
the 
capacity (how much 
wastewater can it treat)?

What is done with the treated wastewater?
 
•
 
Are there 
public 
toilets in this area?
 
E.g., for the use of the various service providers such as 
guards
, maids etc.
 
•
 
Where 
is the 
solid waste
 
(
e.g., 
kitchen waste, 
packaging, hygiene products
 
like 
disposable 
diapers, sanitary napkins
)
 
disposed? E.g., 
disposed through 
a
 
private 
waste collection service
, 
through

solid 
waste collected?
 
•

•
 
Is 
the
 
wet/ dry waste (e.g., kitchen waste, 
paper, 
glass, packaging material 
etc.)
 
separated at the

/ Agriculture

tances to their workplace?

ola/uber service

ow many
